name: al-hosn castle
des: a cathlic castle belong to the period of the Crusades ,located on the coastal mountin ranges, just 60km away from homs , considered by the UN a great historical castle

name: margeorges
des: a monastrey located in al-myshtaea involving three chapels is considered one of the most beautiful masterpieces of  byzantine architecture

name: mother mary statue
Sdes: the tallest statue in the middle east and an important tourism site

name: mount sayeh
des: it rises approximayely 980 meters above sea level, its name after the monks who visited it.mount alsayeh gained new importance after the buliding the statue of virgin mary on the highest peak.which was built in 2009 as part of citadle and alwadi festival
Sdes: a mountain with beautiful nature and great religious signifcance
visit_info: no restrictions but the curch and statue are open daily till 20:00
